# LMS SaaS Project Instructions

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements

- [x] Launch the Project (Live on Vercel)
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Overview
This is a complete Learning Management System (LMS) built with Next.js 16, featuring:
- User authentication and role-based access (admin, teacher, student, parent)
- Course management with sections and lessons
- Progress tracking and badges
- Multi-language support (EN/FR/AR)
- Dark/light theme switching
- File uploads to Cloudflare R2
- Email notifications via MailerSend
- Deployed on Vercel with Supabase database

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js 16 App Router patterns
- Implement proper error handling and loading states
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling with shadcn/ui components
- Ensure responsive design for all screen sizes
- Test all features thoroughly before deployment

## Deployment
The project is deployed on Vercel and accessible at the provided URL. All integrations are configured and working.
